singleExpressionCProgram :: (DimensionType d, NumType et) => ValMaps -> Expression d et -> Code Source #

Generate a fully working C program that compute the expression and print out the result

localOffset :: [Int] -> [Int] -> Int Source #

Compute the inner offset: e.g localOffset [3, 4, 5] [2, 0, 1] = 2 * (4 * 5) + 0 * (5) + 1
